summary: Sometimes DOD determines that defense items—such as older model Humvees—are no longer needed. These vehicles are designated as excess and are made available to foreign countries upon request. We found that 23 countries (mostly from the Middle East and Africa) requested excess Humvees from 2012-2018 to support activities like border security and counterterrorism operations. DOD approved nearly half of these requests. The Humvee manufacturer expressed...
title: Military Equipment: Observations on the Transfer of Excess Humvees to Foreign Governments
